channel.title: Vid-Ricco Presents...
channel.itunes:author: Rich Dupuis
channel.description: See what can be done with iMovie and a bit of an imagination. This is a collection of fun videos. Many are from Japan (and other places) as captured by Rich Dupuis, a Canadian English teacher living in Japan. Some of the videos are comedic, some are cultural, while others touch on the spiritual, all are entertaining.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Voice of Video!
channel.itunes:summary: See what can be done with iMovie and a bit of an imagination. This is a collection of fun videos. Many are from Japan (and other places) as captured by Rich Dupuis, a Canadian English teacher living in Japan. Some of the videos are comedic, some are cultural, while others touch on the spiritual, all are entertaining.
channel.itunes:keywords: culture, amature video, Japan, Guam, Canada

item.title: Kawloon Walled City
item.itunes:author: Rich Dupuis
item.description: We visit the infamous "Kowloon Walled City in Hong kong and testify of what has happened thru the work Jacky Pullenger. This is a must if your are struggling with any kind of addiction, or you just want to feel like there is Hope!

item.itunes:author: Rich Dupuis
item.description: Find out what happens when the seemingly unstoppable Godzilla comes to twon. Who can stop him? It's the Ultimate show down! This movie was actually filmed in Mito, Japan.
